ui.drawer

Class DrawerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ui.drawer.DrawerController

  • public class DrawerController
extends java.lang.Object
    Processes user input on drawers, updates fields with correct information.
    Author:
    David Cosby

      • isSubmitKey

        private boolean isSubmitKey(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent e)
        Parameters:
        e - KeyEvent with KeyCode information
        Returns:
        whether the key pressed is an Enter or Tab key. Used to decided whether the move the Focus down and update from the TextField data.

      • listenForUserInput

        private void listenForUserInput()
        Connects each of the textFields to code that will handle user input

        private void updateOneTimePlanetInformation()

        Parameters:
        open - whether we are open for changes or not.
